plays.text: Goal scored by Zdeno Ciger assisted by Vincent Lecavalier
Penalty to SEBASTIEN BORDELEAU 2 minutes for Tripping Juha Ylonen
Penalty to SHELDON KEEFE 2 minutes for Slashing Todd Simpson
Penalty to Pavel Kubina 2 minutes for Tripping Michal Handzus
Goal scored by MARTIN ST. LOUIS assisted by Fredrik Modin
Penalty to Todd Simpson 2 minutes for Slashing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Jassen Cullimore 2 minutes for Roughing Shane Doan
Penalty to Danny Markov 2 minutes for Tripping Fredrik Modin
Goal scored by Dave Andreychuk assisted by Grant Ledyard and Vaclav Prospal
